pkgmetadata.longdescription: =======================Behatrix=======================Behatrix is a program for the analysis of behavioral sequences.By using a flexible and efficient approach, Behatrix allows analyzing large sets of behavioral sequencesand can organize data into contingency tables. The program can also perform permutations test and autonomouslygenerate the code for a flow diagram representing the transitions between behaviors.Features=======================- Behaviors statistics- Transitions statistics- Flow diagram- Permutations test- Levenshtein distances and Needleman-Wunsch identitiesRequirements=======================- PyQt5- NumpyChange Log=======================Please consult the `Revision history`_... _Revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/behatrix/wiki/revision-history
